title: Barcelona 'identify Lautaro Martinez as ideal man to replace Luis Suarez'
text:
Barcelona have made Lautaro Martinez their No 1 target to replace the ageing Luis Suarez, according to reports.

Inter Milan are not keen to lose the striker, who has impressed since moving to Italy in July 2018, and plan to open contract negotiations to raise or remove his current release clause.

But Ernesto Valverde's side are keen to bring him in and could take advantage of the clause, which is well below his actual market value of around €100million (£86m).

Barcelona have made Lautaro Martinez their No 1 target to replace the ageing Luis Suarez

The Nou Camp club want to replace the 32-year-old Luis Suarez in the coming years

A report in Italian outlet Calcio Mercato suggests they believe he is the ideal man to take over from Suarez, who is 32.

Martinez has scored 10 goals in his 35 league appearances for Inter and has two in eight European matches.

He also caught the eye when they visited the Nou Camp earlier this season, scoring within two minutes of kick-off.

'Talk of Barcelona's interest is true,' the player's agent Alberto Yaque told Argentinian newspaper Ole back in July.

'No-one's called us, but we know that they've been looking at him strongly. It's true that Barcelona like him.'
description: Inter Milan are not keen to lose the striker, who has impressed since moving to Italy in July 2018, and plan to open contract negotiations to raise or remove his current release clause.
